snippet.title: [Official] Pixel-arts Adventure with Seven Lucky Gods Rainbow Sea Trailer [iOS/Android]
snippet.description:
The English version of Rainbow Sea, a free app for iOS and Android from indie game studio Shirokurohitsuji, will be released in June 2021.

Rainbow Sea is an adventure game with beautiful pixel-arts. The player spends a year interacting with the Seven Lucky Gods in the treasure ship. More than 100 different events can be enjoyed in the game. Depending on the player's actions and choices, various friendships, romances, and adversarial relationships can develop with the Seven Lucky Gods, and there are 22 different endings. It takes about one to two hours to reach one ending. There is a save function, so you can stop playing whenever you want.

Official site URL (English version is under constructing!) : https://shirokurohitsuji.studio/products/rainbowsea/
AppStore URL : https://apps.apple.com/app/id1523118441
GooglePlay URL : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=studio.shirokurohitsuji.rainbowsea
